articles.title: Microsoft to bring Call of Duty to Nintendo; Sony on the spot - Nikkei Asia
articles.description: Analysts see move as effort to push PlayStation maker into similar deal
articles.content: TOKYO (Reuters) -- Microsoft has entered into a 10-year commitment to bring the gaming title "Call of Duty" to Nintendo platforms, the chief executive officer of Microsoft Gaming, Phil Spencer, said … [+1533 chars]

articles.title: Christmas light-up: Glowing dinosaurs, a puzzle hunt and food trucks at Changi Festive Village - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: The Avatar-inspired Dino Glow is touted as Changi's longest-ever festive light-up. Check it out from now until Jan 31.
articles.content:
There's also a Virtual Run or Ride Challenge for runners and cycling enthusiasts as part of Changi Jurassic Adventure, which can be completed any time between Dec 12 and Jan 31.
Racers can unlock di… [+850 chars]

articles.title: K-drama idol Jung Hae-in on loneliness, wearing an eye patch and his newfound respect for Marvel actors - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: The star of Disney+'s Korean thriller Connect also shares what it was like connecting with Japanese director Miike Takashi and dealing with a lot of CGI.
articles.content: Agreeing to a project like Connect was a no-brainer for the actor, and a lot to do with that decision was the opportunity to work with the Japanese director Miike Takashi, who is best known for his d… [+758 chars]

articles.title: HIV Care Continuum & Beyond: A New Era for Asia - amfAR, The Foundation for AIDS Research
articles.description: With amfAR as co-partner, an initiative to promote strengthening access to the HIV care continuum assesses what policies and programs are working.
articles.content: There are an estimated 6.0 million people living with HIV in the Asia-Pacific region. A quarter of new HIV infections are among young people aged 15 to 24, and almost all occur among members of key p… [+1231 chars]
